Variable HARTREE_TO_KJ_MOL

  • Defined in File high_level_energy.h

Variable Documentation

const double HARTREE_TO_KJ_MOL = 2625.5002

Conversion factor from Hartree to kJ/mol.

Used to convert atomic unit energies to chemical energy units. Value: 2625.5002 kJ/mol per Hartree
